commit.message: Condense suffix strings of simple wildcards in patterns

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+// rustfmt-condense_wildcard_suffices: true
+
+fn main() {
+    match x {
+        Butt(..) => "hah",
+        Tup(_) => "nah",
+        Quad(_, _, x, _) => " also no rewrite",
+        Quad(x, ..) => "condense me pls",
+        Weird(x,
+              _,
+              _,
+              // dont condense before
+              ..) => "pls work",
+    }
+}
